programme.desc: Naruto: Batalha Byakugan: Hinata Ganha Coragem!

programme.title: Pet Sematary, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Based on the terrifying novel by Stephen King... After the Creed family moves to rural Maine, they stumble upon an ancient burial ground with sinister powers. When tragedy strikes, a perilous chain of events unleashes an unfathomable evil.

programme.title: Hereditary, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: When the matriarch of the Graham family passes away, her daughter (Toni Collette) and grandchildren begin to unravel cryptic and increasingly terrifying secrets about their ancestry, trying to outrun the sinister fate they have inherited.

programme.title: Mother's Day, (2016, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Rebecca DeMornay is terrifying in this brutal gorefest. When her sons break into a home and take the owners hostage, she teaches them what real torture is all about. Costars Shawn Ashmore.

programme.title: Texas Chainsaw, (1970, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: A young woman inherits an isolated mansion from a distant relative, but an unspeakable horror awaits her in the mansion's dank cellars.

programme.title: Ginger Snaps, (2001, Horror)
programme.desc: The Craft meets The Howling in this edgy, modern werewolf tale in which a teenage girl must choose between saving herself and joining her sister in an otherworldly existence.

programme.title: The Dark Half, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: A writer undergoes an operation that reveals a twin in his brain. He begins a double writing life, using a pseudonym for his disreputable best-sellers. When the pseudonym discovers he is to be eradicated, he goes on a murderous rampage.

programme.title: Death Note: Impatience
programme.desc: Light, acting as L, reveals to Near that his sister Sayu has been kidnapped by someone wanting to trade her for the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Father
programme.desc: Light tries to discover where Mello and his Mafia associates are hiding and uses Misa's eyes to find the Death Note's current owner.

programme.title: Death Note: Justice
programme.desc: Mello busts into SPK headquarters to retrieve a photograph of himself to make sure he won't be killed by Kira.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Eager to identify Leaky Eye Lucas attacker, Bucciarati confronts Giorno and unleashes a Stand attack to dismantle him piece by piece. But Giorno counters with his Stand Golden Wind, surprising not just his adversary, but also himself.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Meet the Gangster Behind the Wall
programme.desc: Determined to join the mafia gang Passione, altruistic Giorno is introduced by Bucciarati to the grotesquely corpulent Polpo, an incarcerated capo who tests Giornos loyalty with a simple but bizarrely lethal test involving a lighter and its flame.
programme.sub-title: Meet the Gangster Behind the Wall

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Plodding amid the dusky shadows of a peaceful piazza is Polpos macabre Stand, which assails any who dare witness the reigniting of the lighter. Giorno deciphers its method of attack, but is soon staring death in the face as Koichi comes to his aid.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Find Polpo's Fortune!
programme.desc: While word of the high-ranking capo Polpos alleged suicide sparks astonishment and speculation in the crime syndicate Passione, Giorno is inducted into Bucciaratis eclectic mafia family. The only problem now is the vast fortune seemingly up for grabs.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Sailing to the Isle of Capri to recover Polpos estate, Bucciarati and team are ambushed by a stealthy enemy Stand that deflates them into rubber-like human pelts. Abbacchio, however, thinks he can find his comrades and reluctantly activates his Stand.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Having beheaded their captor by zipper, the team learns its plan has been leaked to Zuccheros cohort, who is lying in wait on Capri. With fish and gun, Giorno and Mista swim to the island to beat the boat and weed out their assassin-in-waiting.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: As Mista closes in on Sale, all signs seem to point to an easy kill. If only it werent for the truck hurtling up a mountainous Capri road stuck to his hand or Sales power to freeze all objects, gunman Mista would be celebrating over his enemys corpse.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Within arms reach of Polpos fortune, Bucciarati and team meet the unassuming Pericolo, a capo who has come to accept the treasure. In presenting the loot, Bucciarati is bestowed not only the rank of capo but also an immense duty: protect Trish Una.
programme.sub-title: The First Mission From the Boss

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Killua defies his family's wishes in order to revive Gon.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The fourth round of voting to select the new chairman is held.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Hisoka appears before Gotoh and the other butlers who are trying to protect Killua.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The remaining eight candidates now compete in the 5th round of voting to select the new chairman.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The 7th round of voting is held and the field narrows to the remaining 4 candidates.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Beans counts the votes and the winner is revealed.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon recovers and sees his father, Ging for the first time.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Koala, a Chimera Ant, confesses all of his sins to a red-haired girl.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and Ging spend their first father and son moment together.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon departs on a journey to take the Hunter Exam and meets Leorio and Kurapika who also want to be Hunters.

programme.title: Death Note: Transfer
programme.desc: Near contacts the Japanese task force and determines that Kira is among their members.

programme.title: Death Note: Selection
programme.desc: Star newscaster Kiyomi Takada becomes Kira's spokesperson to the world.

programme.title: Death Note: Scorn
programme.desc: Light pretends to investigate Kiyomi.

programme.title: Death Note: Vigilance
programme.desc: Aizawa figures out what's going on and tells Near, who already knows about the notes.

programme.title: Death Note: Malice
programme.desc: Light gives Kiyomi the order to finish off Near.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: D'Arby the Gambler, Part 2
programme.desc: After losing to D'Arby, Joseph and Polnareff have their souls taken. In order to have their souls returned, Jotaro shows off Star Platinum's powers before beginning a match with D'Arby, warning him that cheating won't work.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Hol Horse and Mondatta, Part 1
programme.desc: Hol Horse arrives at Cairo in order to pursue Jotaro and the others. He has joined forces with another partner and is after the lives of Jotaro and crew once more. What's more, his new partner is none other than Mondatta.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Hol Horse and Mondatta, Part 2
programme.desc: Following Mondatta's prediction, Hol Horse sticks his fingers into Polnareff's nose, but he doesn't know what to do from there. Making matters worse, Jotaro and the others show up in search of Polnareff, forcing Hol Horse into a tough spot.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 1
programme.desc: Jotaro and his friends continue to search for DIO's mansion in Cairo. Following Avdol's advice, they have a beggar look for the mansion and wait. Meanwhile, Iggy, wandering the city alone, is confronted by two large dogs.
programme.sub-title: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 2
programme.desc: Iggy ends up in a battle to the death in the sewers against Pet Shop, the falcon that guards DIO's mansion. Despite being injured, Iggy runs to the river in an attempt to escape, but he may have underestimated Pet Shop's abilities.
programme.sub-title: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: D'Arby the Player, Part 1
programme.desc: Though purchased dearly with Iggy's injury, Jotaro and his group finally have the location of DIO's palace. Waiting for them where they find the butler, Darby Younger, brother of the gambler they previously defeated.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: D'Arby the Player, Part 2
programme.desc: The battle for souls with D'Arby continues. Kakyoin challenges D'Arby to a racing game but ends up losing both the race and his soul. Before Joseph really has time to react, Jotaro picks the next game.

programme.title: The Wood, (1999, Romance)
programme.desc: Lots of guys have second thoughts about marriage. Three hours before his wedding, Roland is having third, fourth and fifth thoughts. Good thing hes got buddies Slim and Mike around to help.

programme.title: In Too Deep, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: Officer Cole is assigned to infiltrate the syndicate of God, a deadly crime lord. But as Cole sinks deeper into God's crew, he begins to get in over his head, until the line that separates his true identity from his street persona begins to disappear.

programme.title: Talk to Me, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: When a group of friends discover how to conjure spirits with an embalmed hand, they become hooked on the new thrill, unleashing terrifying supernatural forces, in the eye-popping, nightmarish debut from filmmakers Danny & Michael Philippou.

programme.title: Fast Color, (2019, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Hunted by mysterious forces and a local sheriff, a young woman with supernatural abilities flees back to her familyand unearths the depths of the power within her.

programme.title: Body Cam, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: A police officer (Mary J. Blige) investigating a fellow officer's murder discovers an evil spirit targeting the cops in her unit, uncovering a sinister secret surrounding the shooting and cover-up of an unarmed youth in this intense action thriller.

programme.title: The Reading, (2023, Thriller)
programme.desc: After a deadly home invasion, Emma (Mo'Nique Hicks) copes by writing a book, but when a young psychic and her team perform a reading in her home, a new terror is unleashed.

programme.title: The Brother From Another Planet, (1984, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A mute alien with the appearance of a black human is chased by outer-space bounty hunters through the streets of Harlem.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: Sidney Poitier and Rod Steiger (who won a Best Actor Oscar for his performance) shine in this classic mystery-thriller that took home five Academy Awards, including Best Picture and Best Adapted Screenplay. Lee Grant and Warren Oates also star.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: In 1905, revolutionist Sun Yat-Sen visits Hong Kong to discuss plans with Tongmenghui members to overthrow the Qing dynasty. But when they find out that assassins have been sent to kill him, they assemble a group of protectors to prevent any attacks.

programme.title: 14 Blades, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Qinglong (Action icon Donnie Yen) is a legendary royal guard trained in a clandestine form of combat from childhood in order to devote his life and lethal prowess to the service of the Emperor.

programme.title: Legend of the Fist: The Return of Chen Zhen, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Incredible martial arts sequences mark this thriller about a legendary fighter who takes on ruthless outside oppressors in World War II-era Shanghai.

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Set in 198 A.D., when the Eastern Han Dynasty has collapsed into civil war, and the young Emperor is a puppet of prime minster and generalissimo Cao Cao (Jiang), the film singles out two famous chapters from Guans (Yen) many heroic adventures.

programme.title: Dragon, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Liu Jin-xi (Donnie Yen) is a village craftsman whose quiet life is irrevocably shattered by the arrival of two notorious gangsters in the local general store.

programme.title: Special ID, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: An undercover cop (Donnie Yen) infiltrates one of China's most ruthless crime syndicates. He must risk everything to protect his family and his life after the boss (Collin Chou) vows to find and kill every traitor in his organization.

programme.title: Iceman, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Four hundred years after being frozen in time, a Ming Dynasty palace guard and his three associates are thawed and left to adjust to the modern-day.

programme.title: Iceman: The Time Traveler, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: In the action-packed second chapter of the Iceman saga, Ying's heroic fight to rewrite history and reclaim his honor continues but those he trusts most may be leading into a deadly trap.

programme.title: Blades of Glory, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two figure skating rivals are banned from the sport after a brawl over the gold medal. Joining forces, they find a loophole in the rules that allows them to skate again... as a pair!

programme.title: The Other Guys, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: A buddy cop movie from the Director of 'Talladega Nights' and 'Step Brothers.'

programme.title: Waiting for Guffman, (1997, Comedy)
programme.desc: Would-be Broadway director Corky St. Clair writes, directs, choreographs and costumes a local show celebrating Blaine, Missouri's 150th anniversary in this hilarious comic spoof.

programme.title: Best In Show, (2000, Comedy)
programme.desc: From the creators of Waiting for Guffman comes a hilarious mock documentary exposing the wondrously diverse dog owners who travel from all over the United States to showcase their four-legged contenders at the prestigious Mayflower Dog Show.

programme.title: A Mighty Wind, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: When folk icon Irving Steinbloom passed away, he left a family of performers he had shepherded to folk stardom. For one night only in New York City's Town Hall, three groups will reunite to celebrate the music that almost made them famous.

programme.title: A.C.O.D., (2013, Comedy)
programme.desc: Carter, a seemingly well-adjusted Adult Child of Divorce. After surviving his parents' divorce, Carter has a successful career and girlfriend. But when his brother gets engaged, Carter must reunite his bitterly divorced parents for the wedding.

programme.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Leslie Nielsen stars as Police Squad's own granite-jawed, rockbrained cop Frank Drebin, who bumbles across a mind control scheme to assassinate Queen Elizabeth.

programme.title: The Naked Gun 2 1/2: The Smell of Fear, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: Lt. Frank Drebin (Leslie Nielsen) loves a mystery. Why are we here? Is there life after sex? Yes, Drebin tackles the big issues and the biggest of all is how to stop devious Quentin Hapsburgs (Robert Goulet) plan to destroy the environment!

programme.title: Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: Oscar night. Will someone please kick that numbskull off-stage? Wait! Thats no ordinary numbskull. Thats Lt. Frank Drebin, crashing the ceremonies to stop a terrorist plot!

programme.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Leslie Nielsen stars as Police Squad's own granite-jawed, rockbrained cop Frank Drebin, who bumbles across a mind control scheme to assassinate Queen Elizabeth.

programme.title: The Beautician and The Beast, (1997, Romance)
programme.desc: A New York cosmetologist mistakenly thought to be a science teacher is offered a job to teach the children of an Eastern European dictator.

programme.title: An Officer and a Gentleman, (1982, Drama)
programme.desc: Loner Zack Mayo (Richard Gere) enters Officer Candidate School to become a Navy pilot and in thirteen torturous weeks, he learns the importance of discipline, love, and friendship.

programme.title: A Walk to Remember, (2002, Drama)
programme.desc: Two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is sentenced to perform community service.

programme.title: The Prince and Me, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: A fairy tale love-story about a pre-med student who falls in love with a Danish Prince who refused to follow the traditions of his parents and has come to the US to rebel.

programme.title: Jersey Girl, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: Ben Affleck, Jennifer Lopez, and George Carlin headline this irresistible comedy from director Kevin Smith (CLERKS). It's a heartfelt tale of a suddenly-single father who must accept his identity, and acknowledge what makes him happy.

programme.title: Ghost, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: Patrick Swayze plays a ghost who teams with a psychic (Whoopi Goldberg) to uncover the truth behind his murder and to rescue his sweetheart (Demi Moore) from a similar fate.

programme.title: Titanic, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar-nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as Jack and Rose, the young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic.

programme.title: Autumn In New York, (2000, Drama)
programme.desc: Autumn in New York follows the sexual exploits of Will Keane (RICHARD GERE) until he runs into an unexpected dead end when he meets Charlotte Fielding (WINONA RYDER). Charlotte is half Will's age and twice his match.

programme.title: A Simple Plan, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: In a gym bag. That's how three men size up what they've found in the snowy Minnesota woods. They've come across a downed plane with a rotting corpse inside...and over $4 million stuffed inside a duffel bag. Finders, keepers? Maybe.

programme.title: The Gift, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Widow and mother of three, Annie Wilson makes her living by foretelling others' futures...though her own has become cloudier than even she can see.

programme.title: Thunderheart, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: Val Kilmer, Sam Shepard and Graham Greene star in this murder mystery filled with style and suspense. Kilmer stars as Ray Levoi, a hotshot FBI agent who's thrust into a strange new world when he is sent to solve a murder on an Indian reservation.

programme.title: Single White Female, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: SWF seeks female to share apt in West 70s. Non-smoker, professional preferred. An innocent want ad opens the door to murderous, unrelenting terror in this pulse-pounding psychological shocker starring Bridget Fonda and Jennifer Jason Leigh. Rated: R

programme.title: Side Effects, (2013, Thriller)
programme.desc: A woman turns to prescription medication as a way of handling her anxiety concerning her husband's upcoming release from prison.

programme.title: Blow Out, (1981, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Philadelphia sound-effects man witnesses and records a car accident that turns out to be a politically motivated murder.

programme.title: A Most Wanted Man, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Phillip Seymour Hoffman stars in this action-thriller from spymaster John Le Carre. German and U.S. intelligence agencies race to uncover the identity of a mysterious man.

programme.title: Collateral, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Vincent is a cool, calculating contract killer at the top of his game. Max is a cabbie with big dreams and no results. On this fateful night, Max has to transport Vincent on his next job - one night, five stops, five hits and a getaway.

programme.title: Memento, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

programme.title: The Master, (2012, Drama)
programme.desc: Haunted by his past, WW-II veteran and drifter Freddie Quell (Joaquin Phoenix) crosses paths with a mysterious movement led by The Master (Phillip Seymour Hoffman) and his wife (Amy Adams).

programme.title: The Fighter, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: Based on a true story, two brothers, against all the odds, come together to train for a historic title bout that has the power to reunite their fractured family and give their hard-luck town what it's been waiting for: pride.

programme.title: Warrior, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: WARRIOR tells the moving and inspirational story of the Conlon family, Brendan (Joel Edgerton), Tommy (Tom Hardy) and Paddy (Nick Nolte), who find redemption in the ring as they fight to repair themselves and their family.

programme.title: Braveheart, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: William Wallace, a commoner, unites the 13th Century Scots in their battle to overthrow English rule.

programme.title: The Illusionist, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

programme.title: Rocketman, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: This one-of-a-kind musical biopic embarks on the spectacular journey of Elton John in his rise to fame. With incredible performances of Elton's most beloved songs, discover how a small-town boy became one of the most iconic figures in rock & roll.

programme.title: The Doors, (1991, Musical)
programme.desc: Jim Morrison, one of the most sensual figures in the history of rock and roll, explodes on the screen in THE DOORS, the electrifying movie about a time called the sixties and a legendary outlaw who rocked Americas consciousness forever.

programme.title: Rocketman, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: This one-of-a-kind musical biopic embarks on the spectacular journey of Elton John in his rise to fame. With incredible performances of Elton's most beloved songs, discover how a small-town boy became one of the most iconic figures in rock & roll.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in the West, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: The epic story of a mysterious stranger with a harmonica who joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

programme.title: True Grit, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.title: The Unforgiven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: John Huston directs Audrey Hepburn in this thrilling, romantic western about a woman who becomes the target of lawless racism and brutality when it is discovered that she was born to the Kiowa tribe but secretly adopted by a white frontier family.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Heaven's Gate, (1981, Action)
programme.desc: This ambitious frontier epic features a lawman (Kris Kristofferson) and a hitman (Christopher Walken) who fight in a tragic class war between ranchers and starving immigrants.

programme.title: Billy the Kid, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: When a bounty hunter kills a member of an outlaw gang, all Hell breaks loose in this shoot-em-up tale of gun smoke and justice in the Old West.

programme.title: True Grit, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: True Grit is a powerful story of vengeance and valor set in an unforgiving and unpredictable frontier where justice is simple and mercy is rare.

programme.title: Tomb Raider, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Armed with only her sharp mind, blind faith and stubborn spirit, young Lara Croft pushes past her limits on her very first perilous adventure into the unknown. If she survives, it could be the making of herearning her the name tomb raider.

programme.title: The Host, (2013, Adventure)
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over humans' bodies and erasing their minds, Melanie Stryder risks everything to protect the people she cares about most, proving that love can conquer all in a dangerous new world.

programme.title: A-X-L, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: A.X.L. is a top-secret, robotic dog created by the military to help protect tomorrow's soldiers. Code named by the scientists who created him, A.X.L. stands for Attack, Exploration, Logistics, and embodies next-generation artificial intelligence.

programme.title: Ne Zha, (2019, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A young boy, with the power to destroy the world, must choose between good and evil in order to break the shackles of fate and become the hero.

programme.title: Coraline, (2009, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Coraline Jones discovers a secret world that's like her own, but better! When her Other Mother tries to keep her, Coraline must be brave to get home.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: Cradle of Life, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest, (1999, Adventure)
programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.title: Blankman, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: In Living Color's favorite team of Damon Wayans and David Alan Grier joins Robin Givens, Jon Polito and Jason Alexander in this hilarious crime-fighting comedy about two slapstick heroes who triumph over evil... more or less. Rated PG-13

programme.title: Higher Learning, (1995, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Kristy Swanson, Omar Epps and Michael Rapaport star as first-term freshmen who get a crash course in diversity, identity and sexuality in writer/director John Singleton's bold look at contemporary college life.

programme.title: The Quick and the Dead, (1995, Western)
programme.desc: In this edgy and darkly humorous Western, a mysterious young woman rides into the lawless town of Redemption to settle an old score that has haunted her since she was a child. She becomes swept up in a deadly quick-draw tournament. Rated: R

programme.title: Best of the Best, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: Eric Roberts, Philip Rhee, Christopher Penn, John Dye and David Agresta play five men who are selected as members of the U.S. National Karate Team. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Instant Family, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: A couple find themselves in over their heads when they foster three children

programme.title: Hercules, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: The most towering myth of all time meets up with the mission of a real man in this action-adventure thriller that reveals the famed symbol of courage as hes never been seen before: finding the heros heart that beats beneath his colossal image.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Braveheart, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: William Wallace, a commoner, unites the 13th Century Scots in their battle to overthrow English rule.

programme.title: American Beauty, (1999, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Lester's life is far from perfect. As he makes a few changes in his life, the freer and the happier he gets. However, Lester is about to learn that the ultimate freedom comes at a price.

programme.title: Swingers, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this laugh-out-loud indie comedy classic that launched the careers of its outstanding cast, two friends set out to rewrite modern dating from Los Angeles to Las Vegas.

programme.title: Blue Velvet, (1986, Thriller)
programme.desc: A sensual mystery thriller about strange happenings in a small North Carolina town. A college student stumbles across a bizarre mystery and wants to know more, perhaps too much more.

programme.title: Jade, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Corelli is up to his neck in a case that may lead where he doesn't want to go. Chazz Palminteri portrays Matt, an attorney and Corelli's longtime pal. Linda Fiorentino is Matt's wife Trina: a psychologist who's capable of anything, even murder.

programme.title: Kalifornia, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: A graduate student and his girlfriend set out on a cross-country road trip to research a book they are writing on serial killers. Along the way, they pick up an ex-con and his girlfriend who will take them on a ride they'll never forget.

programme.title: Knightriders, (1981, Action)
programme.desc: A medieval reenactment troupe find it increasingly difficult to keep their family-like group together, with pressure from local law enforcement, interest from entertainment agents and a growing sense of delusion from their leader.

programme.title: Labyrinth, (1986, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: Lifeforce, (1985, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: A frightening journey into the unknown awaits an Earthbound scout ship when it comes across an alien spacecraft of enormous proportions. Further investigation reveals a roomful of glass coffins containing the bodies of frozen creatures.

programme.title: Rogue, (2008, Creature Features)
programme.desc: A rugged American adventure-travel journalist on assignment in the Australian outback encounters a man-eating crocodile.

programme.title: The Blackcoat's Daughter, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two terrified girls (Emma Roberts, Kiernan Shipka) must battle a mysterious evil force when they get left behind at their boarding school over winter break in this chilling and suspenseful horror film.

programme.title: X, (2022, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: A group of actors set out to make an adult film in rural Texas under the noses of their reclusive hosts, but when the elderly couple catches their young guests in the act, the cast finds themselves in a desperate fight for their lives.

programme.title: Pearl: An X-traordinary Origin Story, (2022, Slashers and Serial Killers)

programme.title: Devon, (2024, Slashers and Serial Killers)

programme.title: Grease 2, (1982, Musical)

programme.title: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels, (2017, Comedy)

programme.title: Heathers, (1970, Comedy)

programme.title: Miami Blues, (1990, Thriller)

programme.title: Daddy's Home, (2015, Comedy)

programme.title: Luffy is in danger as the venomous fish poison courses through his body! With no antidotes on board, the Straw Hats must rely on a mysterious ship for help - a ship that bears a truly surprising crew!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: On the edge of life and death, Luffy's only hope rests with Sanji's siblings! But even though they refuse to share an antidote, they may be able to save Luffy's life yet, giving him enough energy to plunge right back into trouble.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Poison Crisis! Luffy and Reiju!

programme.title: Arriving on Cacao Island, Luffy and Chopper are in heaven as everything before their eyes is edible!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Totto Land! Emperor Big Mom Appears!

programme.title: The Straw Hats confront Pudding - the fiance of Sanji! But when they challenge her for Sanji's heart, her answer shocks them! Meanwhile, an ominous and mysterious message may spell doom for the Straw Hats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Emperor's Daughter! Sanji's fiance - Pudding!

programme.title: The dangerous waters around the Whole Cake Island harbor terrifying creatures that pose a challenge for the Straw Hats! Meanwhile, Mama slips into a bout of her sickness and ravages her own land in search of a specific pastry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Massive Attack! Mom's Hunger Pangs!

programme.title: Big Mom rampages through the Whole Cake Island in search for sweets - but when the kitchen can't prepare them fast enough, her own son steps in to curb the carnage, with deadly results.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Capital City Falls?! Big Mom and Jimbei!

programme.title: As the Straw Hats draw closer to the Whole Cake Island, Pedro shares his sordid past in Big Mom's territory - and hatches a plan to win back Sanji and take an item of great worth from the Emperor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Emperor's Castle! Arriving at the Whole Cake Island!

programme.title: Brook and Pedro head out in a submersible to infiltrate Big Mom's stronghold! Meanwhile, Luffy, Nami, Chopper and Carrot head into the island chasing the image of Sanji, only to be distracted by the endless supply of sweets and a second Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Mysterious Forest Full of Candies! Luffy vs. Luffy?!

programme.title: Lost in the bewildering woods and chasing after Sanji, Nami and the others find there's more than meets the eye in this upside down part of the Whole Cake Island! Meanwhile, Sanji confronts his brother!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Mom's Assassin! Luffy and the Seducing Woods!

programme.title: Luffy continues to move through the mysterious and dangerous woods, unaware of the danger that lurks in the trees! Meanwhile, Sanji confronts his father as the wounds of his childhood are laid bare!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Seafaring Kingdom! Germa's King Judge!

programme.title: Sanji faces off against his father in a duel! His powerful kicks aim at protecting his hands, but the Germa Family has more in store for him yet! Meanwhile, Luffy goes deeper into the Seducing Woods and falls for their powerful illusions!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle Between Father and Son! Judge vs. Sanji!

programme.title: Big Mom has Caesar Clown at her whims - and despite his bilking her out of countless amounts of money - she is ready to continue her pursuit of maniacal world control!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Giant Ambition! Big Mom and Caesar!

programme.title: Finally, Nami finds Luffy and recounts her harrowing tale of battling Brulee! Meanwhile, the mysterious half-buried man comes clean about his true identity! But this must all be put aside when one of Mom's most powerful generals comes calling!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Land of Souls! Mom's Fatal Ability!

programme.title: The identity of the enigmatic Pound, the man half-buried in the woods, is revealed, but his deep connection to Big Mom might not be enough to save him! Nami's past exploits, however, hold the key to keeping Mom's minions at bay!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Top Officer! The Sweet 3 General Cracker Appears!

programme.title: Luffy squares off against Cracker, one of the Sweet 3 Generals, as Nami learns the truth about others in the Worst Generation who have come before to challenge Big Mom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Enemy Worth 800 million! Luffy vs. Thousand Armed Cracker!

programme.title: Luffy continues to fight against Cracker, whose powers to manipulate his surroundings may prove more troublesome than he had thought! Meanwhile, Brook and Pedro infiltrate the Whole Cake Island - and must hatch a plan to avoid getting caught!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An All-out Duel! Gear Four vs. the Bis-Bis Ability

programme.title: The wind starts to go out of Luffy's sails as he fights an endless army of Biscuit Warriors! Meanwhile, the oldest two Vinsmoke brothers come home from a war to see their long-missing young brother Sanji.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The First and the Second Join! The Vinsmoke Family!

programme.title: Luffy starts to run out of steam as the Biscuit Warriors keep multiplying! If he can buy himself 10 minutes to recharge
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Benefactor's Life! Sanji and Owner Zeff!

programme.title: Luffy needs just 10 minutes to recharge! Nami comes to rescue with the help of the Homies! Meanwhile, Sanji learns the terrible truth of Germa's power - and his father's dark history!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Angry Sanji! The Secret of Germa 66!

programme.title: Nami challenges Cracker on her own! During the all-out fight, she loses her advantage and is close to defeat. Can Luffy bounce back in time? Meanwhile, Sanji's tragic childhood is made clear.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Past that He Let Go of! Vinsmoke Sanji!

programme.title: The terrible history of Sanji's family continue to unfold. From a rare moment of compassion, he is able to escape, only to face his father's cruelty before setting out on his own.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the East Blue! Sanji's Resolute Departure!

programme.title: Luffy is in an all-out, all-you-can-eat battle! As Cracker's endless stream of Biscuit Warriors marches on, Luffy's endless appetite is put to the test. Meanwhile, Reiju helps Sanji to straighten himself out before he meets his fiance.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle of Limits! Luffy and the Infinite Biscuits!

programme.title: Luffy needs to think fast in order to turn the battle in his favor - filled with biscuits, he debuts a new Gear Four attack that has lasting repercussions! Meanwhile, Chopper and Carrot find Sanji's reflection, but can they get a message to him in time?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Power of Satiety! A New Gear Four Form - Tank Man!

programme.title: Luffy finally catches up with Sanji! However, as a happy past plays before his eyes in which he, Sanji, and the crew deepened their bonds, a new page is turning in the history of the Straw Hats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Heartbreaking Duel! Luffy vs Sanji! - Part 1

programme.title: Sanji's journey with the crew looks to be coming to an end!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Heartbreaking Duel! Luffy vs Sanji! - Part 2

programme.title: Luffy makes a solemn promise to not move from his spot until Sanji returns to him. But as Mama's army advances, that promise may prove a costly one. Meanwhile, Sanji and the Vinsmokes come face to face with Big Mom and his bride-to-be Pudding!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Storm of Revenge! An Enraged Army Comes to Attack!

programme.title: Luffy stands his ground and waits for his friend to return! But the vengeful army washes over him - only a true friend can step in to turn the tide of battle! Meanwhile, Sanji and Pudding discuss their marriage - and come to a startling conclusion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Adventure! Sanji's Resolute Proposal!

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: Ghost In The Shell, (1995, Anime)
programme.desc: 2029 A female government cyber agent and the Internal Bureau of Investigations are hot on the trail of a "The Puppet Master" a computer virus capable of invading cybernetic brains and altering its victims memory.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Billy Two Hats, (1974, Drama)
programme.desc: Archie (Gregory Peck) and his partner, Billy (Desi Arnaz, Jr.) are bandits by trade, staging daring robberies throughout the American frontier. But when their latest heist takes a deadly turn, they are pursued by a ruthless marshal (Jack Warden).

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Drama)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: True Grit, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.title: El Dorado, (1966, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert Mitchum plays to perfection an alcoholic but gutsy sheriff who relentlessly battles the dark side of the wild West, ruthless cattle barons and crooked businessmen.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Action)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: Bells Of Capistrano, (1942, Drama)
programme.desc: A feud between rodeo companies accelerates when both want Gene Autry, as a crowd-drawing added attraction. This film features Gene singing five hits, including "In Old Capistrano" and "Forgive Me."

programme.title: Call Of The Canyon, (1942, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry leads cattlemen in rebellion when a packing company rep cheats them. A gals future depends on the company's radio spots for her show! It gets exciting when the owner appears incognito.

programme.title: Home in Wyomin', (1942, Drama)
programme.desc: Radio star Gene Autry must solve a murder mystery at the Frontier Days pageant in Wyoming that involves a newspaper photographer, Chicago gangsters, a deserted mine, and a surprise ending.

programme.title: Canadian Pacific, (1949, Drama)
programme.desc: A surveyor for the Canadian Pacific Railroad must fight fur trappers who oppose the building of the railroad by stirring up Indian rebellion.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romance)
programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: Almost Famous, (2000, Drama)
programme.desc: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies it on their concert tour.

programme.title: Bandits, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: The suave Joe and his hypochondriac partner Terry have escaped from prison. Cutting a swath from Oregon through California, these fugitives rob banks in order to finance their scheme for a new life south of the Border.

programme.title: Hart's War, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: War hero Col. McNamara is imprisoned in a German POW camp. As the camp's highest-ranking American officer, he commands his fellow inmates. Never giving up the fight to win the war, McNamara is planning, waiting for his moment to strike back at the enemy.

programme.title: Windtalkers, (2002, Drama)
programme.desc: True story about members of the Navajo tribe who proudly served the U.S. in WW II as code talkers by using their native language as a code to relay information to military leaders.

programme.title: The Weather Man, (2005, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Popular Chicago weatherman Dave Spritz (Nicolas Cage) has a shot at the big time when a national morning television show calls him for an audition.

programme.title: Bad Lieutenant: Port of Call New Orleans, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: A drug-addled detective (Nicholas Cage) investigates the killing of 5 immigrants from Senegal in post-Katrina New Orleans. With Eva Mendes. Werner Herzog, director.

programme.title: Lord of War, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Oscar winner Nicolas Cage stars in this taut, action-packed tale of a notorious arms dealer who sold weapons to dictators and successfully outran the law for nearly twenty years.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Hotarus and Mistress 9s consciousnesses engage in a fierce battle. Sailor Moon gives up the Holy Grail to Souichi Tomoe to save Hotarus heart.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Following the fight with Pharaoh 90, Usagi and her friends search for Hotaru in the ruins of Mugen Academy.
programme.sub-title: A New Life: Parting of the Stars of Destiny

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Door of Space and Time is opened, allowing Chibi-Usa to return to the future.
programme.sub-title: A Guardian's Realization: Strength Lies Within a Pure Heart

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa follows a beautiful light into the forest. The owner of that light is Pegasus and he asks Chibi-Usa to keep their meeting a secret.
programme.sub-title: Meeting of Destiny: The Night Pegasus Dances

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: In order to capture Pegasus as their first step in world conquest, Zirconia orders her subordinates to seek out people with beautiful dreams.
programme.sub-title: Super Transformation Once Again: Pegasus's Power

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Having a taste for older woman, Hawk's Eye sets his sights on Usagi's mother, Ikuko.
programme.sub-title: Protect Mom's Dream: Double Moon's New Attack

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tigers Eye approaches Naru in a plot to capture Pegasus in a subspace cage invented by Hawks Eye.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Two of Mamorus friends from college, Saori and Kobayashi, pay him a visit at his apartment in the hopes of meeting his girlfriend Usagi.
programme.sub-title: The Perfect Couple: Usagi and Mamoru's Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Mamoru is helping Usagi and Chibi-Usa with their studies when Luna and Artemis walk in, having a huge fight.
programme.sub-title: Artemis is Cheating? Enter the Mysterious Kitten

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls learn that Tomoko Takase, author of the best-selling book The Moon Night Pegasus, used to be Makoto's classmate from her previous school.
programme.sub-title: Makoto's Friendship: The Girl Who Admired Pegasus

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tiger's Eye hatches a plan to capture Pegasus by using a Lemures that can enter other people's shadow and control them from within.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A small fire incident leaves Mamoru's apartment in a total mess, forcing him to stay at Rei's place for the time being.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa bumps into a young man after becoming enthralled in a beautiful illustration book she had Usagi buy for her.
programme.sub-title: Forest of Illusion: A Beautiful Fairy's Invitation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami is shocked when she sees Mamoru coming out of his apartment with another woman.
programme.sub-title: Drive to the Heavens: The Dream Car Fueled with Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa befriends Miharu, who is aiming to be the best swordwoman in Japan.
programme.sub-title: Aiming for the Top: The Pretty Swordswoman's Dilemma

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Yoshiki Usuis new store opens. Usagi and her friends head out to see the fashion show, along with Fishs Eye, who is captivated by Usui's good looks.
programme.sub-title: We Love Fashion: The Stylish Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi spots Minako out on a date with a handsome man. To everyone's surprise, the boyfriend is different from the one Usagi saw earlier.
programme.sub-title: Storm of Love: Minako's Grand Two-Timing Plan

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: An old woman named Mayako lives alone in a mansion. Mayako is very distrustful of strangers, believing they are after her wealth and fortune.
programme.sub-title: The Secret Mansion: A Menu of Love for You

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Reports of Pegasus attacking the town cause Usagi and the other Sailor Guardians to have doubts about whether Pegasus can be trusted or not.
programme.sub-title: Believe in Pegasus: The Four Guardians' Super Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends are enjoying their summer vacation by the beach. Shingo is acting as their bodyguardespecially for Ami, whom he has a crush on.
programme.sub-title: Shining Summer Days: Ami Under the Sea-Breeze

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa see an ad for a free ballet lesson and sign up. As they practice, Fishs Eye draws the class's attention with his dancing skills.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa meet a woman named Rubina who follows them. Rubina is a princess who snuck out to experience life outside of her royal duties.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls attend the school festival. Makoto is asked to dance by a handsome man, who is actually Tiger's Eye in disguise.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Fish's Eye goes after Mamoru. But Mamoru seems to show no interest in being with anyone besides Usagi.
programme.sub-title: Shadow of Evil: The Trio's Last Chance

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Zirconia threatens the Amazon Trio that if they dont capture Pegasus by the next new moon, the magic making them human will wear off.
programme.sub-title: Mirrors of Dreams: The Amazon's Last Stage

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends go to see a show at the Dead Moon Circus. But Momo starts acting peculiar and leaves, causing Chibi-Usa to become worried.
programme.sub-title: The Amazoness: Nightmare from Behind the Mirrors

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami falls in love with a melody she finds online. She works on lyrics that match the melody and also goes to meet the composer, Toshiyuki Nishino.
programme.sub-title: True Power Explodes: Ami's Melody of the Heart

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rei becomes famous after posing for a magazine. A girl named Nanako, expresses her desire to study under Rei so that she can become just like her.
programme.sub-title: Flames of Passion: Mars's Raging Super Attack

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa go to the dentist to get their cavities treated. The dental clinic is actually a trap set up by Palla-Palla to find Pegasus.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako and Makoto compete to win the heart of Honjo, a young principal. But their rivalry starts to put a strain on their friendship.
programme.sub-title: Clash of Dreams: Minako and Makoto's Broken Friendship

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usas school is having a sports day. However, one of its main events is jumping over the vaulting box, which Chibi-Usa is not very good at.
programme.sub-title: Overcome Your Fear: The Jump to Freedom

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa and Usagi befriend a young painter named Kamoi at the park. Kamoi is visited by Cere-Cere, who asks the man to paint a portrait of her.
programme.sub-title: Don't Lose Sight of Your Dreams: The Mirror of Truth

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa is curious to know why Pegasus is reluctant to tell her where he came from. When she confronts Pegasus with the question, he disappears.

programme.title: The Lincoln Lawyer, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A lawyer (Matthew McConaughey) who operates out of the back of his Lincoln Continental lands the case of a lifetime when he defends a Beverly Hills playboy accused of attempted murder.

programme.title: Lawless, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A sadistic Chicago lawman comes to 1931 Virginia to shut down the Bondurant brothers' bootlegging business.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Ten years after his wife and child die in a home invasion, a man carries out an elaborate plot against the prosecutor who cut a deal with one of the killers.

programme.title: Retribution, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A bank executive receives a warning that there is a bomb in his car; unless he cooperates, it will detonate.

programme.title: Nerve, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Partnered with a mysterious stranger (Dave Franco), a high school senior (Emma Roberts) joins a popular online game that dares players to perform increasingly dangerous stunts.

programme.title: Gamer, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A death-row inmate (Gerard Butler) is caught between the inventor (Michael C. Hall) of a deadly online game and a group that opposes the inventor's high-tech slavery.

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: The fate of the human race hangs in the balance when the Witch Queen (Julie Engelbrecht) rises from the dead, seeking revenge against Kaulder (Vin Diesel), the immortal warrior who slayed her centuries ago.

programme.title: The Commuter, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: In the midst of his daily commute, insurance salesman Michael McCauley is contacted by a mysterious stranger who forces him to uncover the identity of a hidden passenger on the train before the last stop.

programme.title: Escape Plan, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: An expert (Sylvester Stallone) in prison security joins forces with an inmate (Arnold Schwarzenegger) to break out of a top-secret, high-tech facility.

programme.title: Cadillac Man, (1990, Comedy)
programme.desc: During one eventful weekend, an aggressive car salesman hits a slump, he may lose his job, his mistress, his other girlfriend, his Mafioso protector and his daughter.

programme.title: Popeye, (1980, Comedy)

programme.title: The Birdcage, (1996, Comedy)

programme.desc: During one eventful weekend, an aggressive car salesman hits a slump, he may lose his job, his mistress, his other girlfriend, his Mafioso protector and his daughter.

programme.title: Barbershop, (2002, Comedy)

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back in Business, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: The Barbershop is threatened by the arrival of a hip, well-financed chain barbershop that's about to open next door.

programme.title: Barbershop: The Next Cut, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: It's been more than 10 years since our last appointment at Calvin's Barbershop. Ice Cube, Cedric the Entertainer and the whole crew are back together for a quick trim, some good conversation, a little gossip...and to save their neighborhood!

programme.title: Show by Rock!! Mashumairesh!!
programme.desc: Mashumairesh goes to watch Criticrista play on the popular music show, Music Terminal, and they run into REIJINGSIGNAL, who are also playing that day.
programme.sub-title: Sq-Sq-Squeeze Heart Shaker and Ain't Nobody Stop

programme.title: Show by Rock!! Mashumairesh!!
programme.desc: To take their singing to the next level, Mashumairesh attends a workshop by Tsurezurenaru Ayatsuri Mugenan; the workshop doesn't feel very much like a workshop.

programme.title: Log Horizon: Destruction of the Round Table

programme.title: O Liquidador, (2011)

programme.title: Assassin's Creed, (2016)

programme.title: Demolidor - O Homem sem Medo, (2003)

programme.title: A Famlia da Noiva, (2005)

programme.title: Sr. & Sra. Smith, (2005)
programme.desc: 2005. Um casal entediado fica surpreso ao descobrir que ambos so assassinos contratados por agncias rivais para se matarem. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Vince Vaughn, Adam Brody, Kerry Washington, Chris Weitz, Rachael Huntley, Keith David, Michelle Monaghan, Stephanie March Diretor: Doug Liman

programme.title: Clube da Luta, (1999)
programme.desc: 1999. Um homem deprimido conhece um fabricante de sabonetes, e juntos formam um clube de luta clandestino que evolui para algo inesperado. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Edward Norton, Brad Pitt, Meat Loaf, Zach Grenier, Richmond Arquette Diretor: David Fincher

programme.title: O Homem da Mfia, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Um assalto a um jogo de pquer ilegal, cujos participantes eram integrantes da mfia, abala o mundo do crime. Um matador profissional contratado para investigar o caso, mas a hesitao de alguns dos participantes coloca a situao fora de controle. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Brad, Liotta, Pitt, Ray Diretor: Andrew Dominik

programme.title: Sem Lei, (2011)
programme.desc: 2011. Um grupo de trs amigos planeja um grande roubo que acaba dando errado quando um deles se revela um traidor. Enganado, Sonny decide assumir o problema de frente e busca vingana contra o antigo parceiro. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Bruce, Phillippe, Ryan, Willis Diretor: Mike Gunther

programme.title: Os 800, (2020)
programme.desc: 2020. Em 1937, oitocentos soldados chineses lutam sob cerco em Xangai, de um armazm no meio do campo de batalha, completamente cercado pelo exrcito japons. Gneros: War Elenco: Zhang Junyi, Zhi-Zhong Huang Diretor: Hu Guan

programme.title: O Franco-Atirador, (2015)
programme.desc: 2015. Depois de uma longa carreira como matador de aluguel, Martin Terrier pretende se aposentar e passar o resto da vida ao lado de sua amada. Mas ele descobre que est sendo trado por pessoas de sua confiana! Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Sean Penn, Jasmine Trinca, Javier Bardem Diretor: Pierre Morel

programme.title: Perseguio Mortal, (2022)
programme.desc: 2022. O ladro realiza o roubo de sua vida quando rouba o traficante psictico, Temple. O plano corre bem at que o ladro descobre um clandestino em seu carro de fuga: a esposa grvida de Temple, Mia. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: James Clayton, Lina Lecompte, Vinnie Jones Diretor: James Clayton

programme.title: Shaft, (2000)

Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Busta Rhymes, Christian Bale, Dan Hedaya, Jeffrey Wright, Richard Roundtree, Samuel L. Jackson, Toni Collette, Vanessa L. Williams, Vanessa Williams, Josef Sommer Diretor: John Singleton

programme.title: Fugindo do Passado, (2022)

programme.desc: A spontaneous date ends in near-violence for Nancy and Esteban; Silas tells Lisa he grows pot; Andy and Doug smuggle their first customer; Celia develops an addiction.

programme.desc: Memoirs tell a deceased womans children of her four-day affair in 1965 with a photographer on assignment. Starring Clint Eastwood, Meryl Streep, Annie Corley.

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: A police detective (Clint Eastwood) defies his superiors to capture a sniper terrorizing San Francisco. Starring Clint Eastwood, Harry Guardino, Reni Santoni.

programme.title: Miltons Secret
programme.desc: A man (Donald Sutherland) teaches his 11-year-old grandson (William Ainscough) how to cope with bickering parents and the neighborhood bully. Starring Donald Sutherland, Michelle Rodriguez, Mia Kirshner.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: When Captain James Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy. Starring Dustin Hoffman, Robin Williams, Julia Roberts.

programme.title: Hulk
programme.desc: Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry. Starring Eric Bana, Jennifer Connelly, Sam Elliott.

programme.title: The Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: When a new global ice-age threatens the world, a climatologist tries to figure out a way to save humanity, and attempts to get to his young son in New York. Starring Dennis Quaid, Jake Gyllenhaal, Ian Holm.

programme.title: Divergent
programme.desc: In a future society, people are divided into factions based on their personalities. After a young woman (Shailene Woodley) learns she is a Divergent and will never fit into any one group, she uncovers a conspiracy to destroy all those like her. Starring Shailene Woodley, Theo James, Ashley Judd.

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: As a ruthless battle threatens humanity, Tris (Shailene Woodley) and Four (Theo James) journey beyond the wall that encloses Chicago to find a peaceful solution for their embroiled city. Starring Shailene Woodley, Theo James, Jeff Daniels.

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Insurgent
programme.desc: Fugitives Tris (Shailene Woodley) and Four (Theo James) search for allies and answers among the ruins of Chicago while arduously trying to evade Jeanine (Kate Winslet), leader of the Erudites. Starring Shailene Woodley, Theo James, Octavia Spencer.

programme.title: The Long Walk
programme.desc: Teens participate in a grueling high-stakes contest where they must continuously walk or be shot by a member of their military escort. Starring Cooper Hoffman, Mark Hamill, Judy Greer.

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: A writer goes mad while serving as caretaker with his wife and clairvoyant son at a snowbound Colorado hotel. Starring Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd.

programme.title: Incendies
programme.desc: A womans last request sends her twin children to the Middle East to find their roots. Starring Lubna Azabal, Melissa Desormeaux-Poulin, Maxim Gaudette.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy, and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Starring Constance Wu, Henry Golding, Michelle Yeoh.

programme.title: Whale
programme.desc: A young boy is sent to live with his grandparents in a remote indigenous community. Starring Timmy Masso, Grace George, Joe Martin.

programme.title: Manufactured Landscapes
programme.desc: The work of photographer Edward Burtynsky includes Chinas ongoing Industrial Revolution.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl
programme.desc: A 10-year-old (Cayden Boyd) and his imaginary friends (Taylor Lautner, Taylor Dooley) try to save a distant planet from the forces of darkness. Starring Taylor Lautner, Taylor Dooley, Cayden Boyd.

programme.title: Two Weeks Notice
programme.desc: A millionaire (Hugh Grant) confronts his feelings for his lawyer (Sandra Bullock), who is quitting after five years of service. Starring Sandra Bullock, Hugh Grant, Alicia Witt.

programme.title: Raise Your Voice
programme.desc: A small-town teenager (Hilary Duff) defies her father (David Keith) and heads to Los Angeles to study at a performing arts school. Starring Hilary Duff, Oliver James, David Keith.

programme.title: Daddy Day Camp
programme.desc: Chaos reigns when two clueless fathers (Cuba Gooding Jr., Paul Rae) take charge of a dilapidated summer camp and its ill-behaved attendees. Starring Cuba Gooding, Lochlyn Munro, Paul Rae.

programme.title: Space Jam
programme.desc: In a desperate attempt to win a basketball match and earn their freedom, the Looney Tunes seek the aid of retired basketball champion, Michael Jordan. Starring Wayne Knight, Theresa Randle, Danny DeVito.

programme.title: Serendipity
programme.desc: A man (John Cusack) and a woman (Kate Beckinsale) try to find each other after spending one night together 10 years earlier. Starring John Cusack, Kate Beckinsale, Molly Shannon.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Writer J.M. Barrie (Johnny Depp) befriends a widow (Kate Winslet) and her four sons who inspire him to create the character Peter Pan. Starring Johnny Depp, Kate Winslet, Julie Christie.

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: Genius British logician and cryptologist Alan Turing (Benedict Cumberbatch) helps crack Germanys Enigma Code during World War II but is later prosecuted by his government for illegal homosexual acts. Starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Keira Knightley, Matthew Goode.

programme.title: Spartacus: House of Ashur
programme.desc: Caesar demands a painful sacrifice from Ashur.

programme.title: The BMF Documentary: Blowing Money Fast
programme.sub-title: The Rise of Black Mafia Family
programme.desc: Terry and Meech arrive in LA. With a steady supply and a trusted network of drivers to move their product nationwide, the Black Mafia Family is officially born; law enforcement ramps up their investigation.

programme.title: Purple Rain
programme.desc: The Kid (Prince) fights his rival (Morris Day) for a singer (Apollonia Kotero) and Minneapolis rock-club success. Starring Prince, Apollonia Kotero, Morris Day.

programme.title: Dangerous
programme.desc: An ex-con and reformed sociopath battles a band of heavily armed mercenaries as he tries to uncover the truth behind his brothers mysterious death. Starring Scott Eastwood, Mel Gibson, Tyrese Gibson.

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: Deadshot, Harley Quinn, Captain Boomerang, Killer Croc and other armed supervillains unite to battle a mysterious and powerful entity, while the diabolical Joker launches an evil agenda of his own. Starring Will Smith, Jared Leto, Margot Robbie.

programme.title: The Stratton Story
programme.desc: Inspired by his wife (June Allyson) and son, Chicago White Soxer Monty Stratton (James Stewart) pitches with an artificial leg. Starring James Stewart, June Allyson, Frank Morgan.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: An ex-gunfighter (Alan Ladd) sides with Wyoming homesteaders (Jean Arthur, Van Heflin) against a ruthless cattle baron. Starring Alan Ladd, Jean Arthur, Van Heflin.

programme.title: The Plainsman
programme.desc: Wild Bill Hickok (Gary Cooper), Calamity Jane (Jean Arthur) and Buffalo Bill (James Ellison) go up against Indians and a gunrunner. Starring Gary Cooper, Jean Arthur, James Ellison.

programme.title: Arizona
programme.desc: A drifter (William Holden) and the cavalry help the first woman (Jean Arthur) in Tucson protect her freight line from Indians. Starring Jean Arthur, William Holden, Warren William.

programme.title: The Silver Horde
programme.desc: A dance-hall floozy (Evelyn Brent) and a socialite (Jean Arthur) lure a young salmon fisherman (Joel McCrea) at a cannery in Alaska. Starring Joel McCrea, Jean Arthur, Evelyn Brent.

programme.title: Danger Lights
programme.desc: A railroad bosss (Louis Wolheim) girlfriend (Jean Arthur) falls in love with an engineer (Robert Armstrong). Starring Louis Wolheim, Robert Armstrong, Jean Arthur.

programme.title: Captain Applejack
programme.desc: A meek wealthy man secretly wishes life were more exciting. He gets his wish when he is confronted by gangsters who believe hes hiding a magnificent treasure on his property. Starring John Halliday, Mary Brian, Kay Strozzi.

programme.title: Mara Maru
programme.desc: A yachtsman (Raymond Burr) hires a deep-sea diver (Errol Flynn) to find a jeweled cross in a PT boat in postwar Manila. Starring Errol Flynn, Ruth Roman, Raymond Burr.

programme.title: Bengazi
programme.desc: Arab tribesmen trap seekers (Richard Conte, Victor McLaglen, Richard Carlson) of gold stashed in a mosque during World War II. Starring Richard Conte, Victor McLaglen, Richard Carlson.

programme.title: Valley of the Kings
programme.desc: An archaeologist (Robert Taylor) and a married woman (Eleanor Parker) dig for a pharaohs treasure-filled tomb in 1900 Egypt. Starring Robert Taylor, Eleanor Parker, Kurt Kasznar.

programme.title: The Secret of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: While searching for buried treasure, a 19th-century British captain (Rory Calhoun) saves a colonels daughter (Patricia Bredin) from villains. Starring Rory Calhoun, Patricia Bredin, John Gregson.

programme.title: Adventure Girl
programme.desc: A man (Nicholas Wagner) and his daughter (Joan Lowell) sail through a storm and outrun natives in Guatemala. Starring Joan Lowell.

programme.title: Sphinx
programme.desc: An Egyptologist (Lesley-Anne Down) finds danger and romance on her way to a tomb in the Valley of the Kings. Starring Lesley-Anne Down, Frank Langella, Maurice Ronet.

programme.title: Watusi
programme.desc: Explorer Allan Quatermains son (George Montgomery) comes to Africa to continue the search for King Solomons mines. Starring George Montgomery, Taina Elg, David Farrar.

programme.title: King Solomons Mines
programme.desc: A noble singing native (Paul Robeson) takes a white hunter (Cedric Hardwicke) into darkest Africa on a search for biblical treasure. Starring Paul Robeson, Cedric Hardwicke, Anna Lee.

programme.title: Good Morning, Miss Dove
programme.desc: An ailing spinster schoolteachers (Jennifer Jones) fate lies with the New England townsfolk she molded as students. Starring Jennifer Jones, Robert Stack, Kipp Hamilton.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
programme.desc: Flashbacks tell the story of a tenderfoot who rose to glory by gunning down the outlaw terrorizing his small town. Starring James Stewart, John Wayne, Vera Miles.

programme.title: The Great McGinty
programme.desc: A dimwitted drifter finds his values changing after he is manipulated into becoming a successful public official. Starring Brian Donlevy, Muriel Angelus, Akim Tamiroff.

programme.title: Mrs. Parkington
programme.desc: The matriarch (Greer Garson) of a family facing ruin recalls how she and her husband (Walter Pidgeon) built an American empire. Starring Greer Garson, Walter Pidgeon, Edward Arnold.

programme.title: A Man to Remember
programme.desc: Impoverished physician and widower John "Doc" Abbott (Edward Ellis) spends his life serving both the poor and rich alike. Starring Edward Ellis, Anne Shirley, Lee Bowman.

programme.title: Alice in Movieland
programme.desc: Alice wins a free trip to Hollywood and dreams about her arrival. Starring Joan Leslie, Nana Bryant, Clara Blandick.

programme.title: Double Dynamite
programme.desc: A bank tellers (Frank Sinatra) reward for saving a bookies life reflects a shortage on his teller girlfriends (Jane Russell) shift. Starring Frank Sinatra, Jane Russell, Groucho Marx.

programme.title: Dean Martin: King of Cool
programme.desc: The in-depth biography explores Dean Martins varied career, including his complicated relationships with Jerry Lewis, Frank Sinatra, Sammy Davis Jr. and others.

programme.title: Tarzan and the Slave Girl

programme.title: Dont Talk
programme.desc: A federal agent tries to find an enemy informant. Starring Donald Douglas, Gloria Holden, Barry Nelson.

programme.title: My Dream Is Yours

programme.title: The Three Musketeers
programme.desc: DArtagnan (Walter Abel) joins swordsmen Athos (Paul Lukas), Porthos and Aramis in the service of Louis XIII. Starring Walter Abel, Paul Lukas, Margot Grahame.

programme.title: Ransom
programme.desc: A rich man (Glenn Ford) stuns his wife (Donna Reed) and town with a televised threat to his sons kidnapper. Starring Glenn Ford, Donna Reed, Leslie Nielsen.

programme.title: The Searchers
programme.desc: A Confederate veteran and his part-Cherokee partner search five years for a kidnapped girl. Starring John Wayne, Jeffrey Hunter, Natalie Wood.

programme.title: Midnight Cowboy

programme.desc: A California ranch couples (George Murphy, Nancy Davis) son (Billy Gray) thinks his dog has been poisoned by a shady stranger. Starring George Murphy, Nancy Reagan, Billy Gray.

programme.desc: A bratty British boy accuses his frumpy nanny (Bette Davis) of awful things. Starring Bette Davis, Wendy Craig, Jill Bennett.

programme.desc: Edith (Bette Davis) kills Margaret, her twin, and takes her identity, fooling Ediths boyfriend (Karl Malden) but not Margarets lover. Starring Bette Davis, Karl Malden, Peter Lawford.

programme.desc: The story of a death that tore apart the Nova Scotia community of Isle Madame, a postcard-perfect collection of Acadian fishing villages off the coast of Cape Breton Island.

programme.title: The Great British Heist
programme.desc: Three bank robbers take refuge in a local club as the police close in. While the long arm of the law surrounding them outside their sanctuary inside the club is threatened as they start to wonder, are their hostages all that they seem to be? Starring David Brook, Kane Cantell, Richard Harding.

programme.title: Million Dollar Lethal Listing
programme.desc: After buying the perfect suburban home, a couple encounter a stranger who claims to be the real owner of the house. They soon find themselves in a living nightmare as they try to unravel the secrets and lies. Starring Morgan Bradley, Jon Briddell, Ciarra Carter.

programme.title: Psycho Therapy: The Shallow Tale of a Writer Who Decided to Write About a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A writer befriends a retired serial killer in a desperate attempt to find inspiration for his next novel and save his marriage. Covering as his marriage counselor, the killer teaches him his methods as reality becomes deadlier than fiction. Starring Steve Buscemi, John Magaro, Britt Lower.

programme.title: Some Other Woman
programme.desc: Eve sees a strange woman watching her and her husband from outside their home. As the stranger slowly intrudes further into their lives, Eve begins to question if shes losing her mind or her husbands loyalty. Starring Tom Felton, Amanda Crew, Ashley Greene.

programme.title: A Friends Obsession
programme.desc: Megan moves across the country to rebuild her life. When she runs into one of her former colleagues, she is pleasantly surprised and the pair become close friends. When he wants more from her, he begins sabotaging everything in Megans life. Starring Karissa Lee Staples, Drew Seeley, Brian Ames.

programme.desc: Tall, dark and handsome Mikail is a stick master in hockey, but his love life is ice-cold; his mother is completely confident she can shoot and score a flame for her son.

programme.desc: Delving into the legacy of filmmakers and uncovers the mystery of why women, especially from underrepresented communities - like Zora Neale Hurston and Esther Eng were - have been erased through historical amnesia.

programme.desc: Four years after a mother is found murdered on a deserted road, investigators link evidence to an air force base where a standardized testing scheme helps connect the murderer to the crime.
